attributes.action: To dissolve o Parliament pending a general election at the earliest opportunity.
attributes.additional_details: This is a neccessity, because this government was falsely elected on lies and a secretive agenda.  This government manifesto has already been proved to be nothing but lies.  All the evidence is in the public domain.
attributes.background: I want Parliament to cast a vote of no confidence in the current leadership of this country and to call an emergency disolvment pending a general election at the earliest opportunity,

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government. This is set out in the Committee's standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/help

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might like to sign this petition:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
